isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - AUTOMATIC DRAIN VALVE (DV-2) - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE
svcproc.para: Every six months or every 50,000 miles (80,000 km), the automatic drain valve should be removed, disassembled, cleaned and lubricated. Parts showing signs of wear or deterioration should be replaced.
Lubricate with Fleetrite EP2 Moly grease or equivalent to NLGI #2 multi-purpose lithium grease.
